description:
Works granted subject to condirtions -  (NB - some work spec has been modified in agreement with the applicant during on site visit 30/10/09).
 
 T28 - Cherry - Approve: Remove growth obstructing parking bay, lightly reduce on opposite side to balance. Crown lift to 2.5m and reduce branches overhanging footway back to half metre within line of kerb.
 
 T29 - False Acacia - Approve: Thin by 30%.
 
 T30 - False Acacia - Approve: +Thin by 30%.
 
 T47 - Lime - Approve: Thin by 30%.
  
 T49 - Cherry - Approve: Thin by 30%, lift to 2.5m, reduce back from building to leaveclearance of no more than 3m.
 
 T51- Birch - Approve: Thin by 20%.
 
 T52 - Birch - Approve: Thin by 20%.
 
 T55 - Birch - Approve: Thin by 20%.
 
 T57 - Birch - Approve: Thin by no more than 10% and Crown Reduce by no more than 15%.
 
 T58 - Sycamore - Approve: Thin by no more than 20%, reduce overhang to private gardens by no more than 2m.
 
 T59 - Hawthorn - Approve: Crown Reduce by no more than 30%, reshape and lift to 2.5m.                                                  
 T60 - Cherry - Approve: Remove.
 
 T62 - Whitebeam - Approve: Lift to 2.5m and reduce overhang ot private gardens by no more than 2m.
 
 T69 - Birch - Approve: Crown Reduce by 15-20%, plus 25% lateral reduction of limb overhanging footpath outside 6/7 Malvern Way.
 
 T71 - Maple - Approve: Thin by no more than 20%.
 
 T72 - Lime - Approve: Thin by 30%.
 
 T73 - Cherry - Approve: Remove.
 
 T75 - Cherry - Approve: Remove.
 
 T78 - Cherry - Approve: Reduce from building, reshape to balance.
 
 T79 - Cherry - Approve: Reduce from building, reshape to balance.
